The specificity of substrate with varying chain length and different saturation was investigated by the colorimetric and titrimetric assay. Furthermore, the specific activity and relative activity of SCNL towards the p-NP fatty acid esters (C 2–C 18), triglycerides (C 2–C 18) and nature oil were measured under different standard assay conditions according to a previous method
14 , with minor modifications.
